column2: Thiruneelakandar is a potter by profession who helps the followers of Lord Shiva.
Story of a king gone crazy
Directed by Ellis Dungan to portray a Romeo-Juliet type romance between Bhagavathar and Santhanalakshmi
Story of the well known poet Poyyamozhi Pulavar
Bilwa Mangal the Sanskrit poet from Benares who wrote an epic on Lord Krishna and his love for a devadasi Chinthamani
